text: Glasgow Coma Scale? - pows ] EYE OPENING Spontaneous 4 Never 1 MOTOR RESPONSE None 1 VERBAL RESPONSE “The highest possible score is 15. A score of 7 or less indicates coma. ‘Williams, P: deWit’s Fundamental Concept and Skills for Nursing, 6% ed, St Louis, 2021, Elsevier
